channel.title: Kalman-filter on Researcher profile
channel.description: Recent content in Kalman-filter on Researcher profile

item.title: Variational Bayes for signal processing
item.description: This is a talk for the Optimization / Machine Learning Competence group at Sioux Technologies. I presented the probabilistic derivations for the Kalman filter, variational Bayesian inference and some of BIASlab’s work on signal processing systems.
